sub_title: Futurist | Entrepreneur | Award-winning Pioneer in Human Development & Systems Change | Founder & CEO of EARTHwise Centre | Keynote Speaker
summary:
Dr. Anneloes Smitsman (Ph.D., LLM),  is a futurist, entrepreneur, keynote speaker, scientist, award-winning and bestselling author and pioneer in human development and systems change. She is the Founder and CEO of EARTHwise Centre, co-founder of EARTHwise DAO, architect of the EARTHwise Constitution for a Planetary Civilization, and lead architect of the EARTHwise Game Plan for Civilizational Transformation, as well as a Steward and systems architect of Hypha. She is sought after around the world for her leadership and innovation in catalyzing the next steps in human consciousness and systemic design for thrivability.

She was awarded the 2022 Visioneers Lifetime Achievement Award, and was crowned overall African winner in the category "Human Development" of the 2022 Africa’s Most Respected CEOs Awards by The Business Executive in collaboration with the Economic Development Board Mauritius. The award acknowledges CEOs' contributions to the attainment of SDGs by African States. Anneloes and her company EARTHwise Centre are also a winner of the BIZZ 2022 Awards, which is a business excellence award by WORLDCOB, and was awarded the Africa’s Women Leaders Citation in 2018 by CMO Asia and World Women Leadership Congress.

Anneloes holds a Master’s degree in Law and Judicial Political Sciences from Leiden University, the Netherlands, and received a degree of Doctor from the Maastricht Sustainability Institute at the School of Business and Economics, Maastricht University, the Netherlands. Her Ph.D. dissertation "Into the Heart of Systems Change," is being implemented worldwide for developing economic, educational, and governance capacities for regeneration and thrivability.

Anneloes is the co-author of the #1 Amazon Bestsellers "The Quest of Rose," winner of the prestigious 2022 Silver Nautilus Book Award, and "Return of the Avatars," winner of the 2023 Gold Nautilus Book Award, which are the first two books of the "Future Humans Trilogy" with Dr. Jean Houston. She is the co-author and co-editor with Dr. Alexander Laszlo of "The New Paradigm in Politics," and the author of "Love Letters from Mother Earth: The Promise of a New Beginning," as well as numerous peer-reviewed journal publications, articles, book chapters, and other publications, including lead author of the r3.0 Educational Transformation Blueprint.

For more information visit - https://www.earthwisecentre.org/anneloes-smitsman

treasury_media.title: EARTHwise Constitution for a Planetary Civilization
treasury_media.description: The EARTHwise Constitution for a Planetary Civilization is a Compass for co-creating thrivable worlds and futures with the wisdom of living systems, in partnership with life and our Earth. It is one of our most ambitious initiatives and invitations for addressing the root causes of our sustainability crisis.

treasury_media.title: Meet the woman who has been working on a Transition Plan for a Thriving Civilization
treasury_media.description: Thought Leadership Profile published by International Business Times, 21 September 2022.

treasury_media.title: Anneloes Smitsman
treasury_media.description: Dr. Anneloes Smitsman (Ph.D., LLM), is a futurist, systems scientist, award-winning pioneer in human development and systems change, and award-winning bestselling author. She is the Founder and CEO of EARTHwise Centre. Her programs, practices, and strategies are sought after around the world for actualizing our future human potential, and catalyzing the next steps in human consciousness and systemic design for thrivability.

treasury_media.title: Coaching Sessions with Anneloes
treasury_media.description: The next step in human consciousness is not about new technologies, or the thrill of altered states. It's about the development of your future human potential in a whole systems way. I am here to help you discover and actualize how to do so effectively, and with greater ease. Join my monthly online group coaching sessions.

projects.title: Vectors of Love™ Initiatives
projects.description:
All our initiatives are guided by three fundamental questions: 
1. What do I reach from – what is my point of origin?
2. How far can I reach inside and outside myself – what is the magnitude of my reach?
3. What am I reaching for & to – what is the direction of my reach?

Through the Vectors of Love™ Initiatives we work on the practical applications of these questions for the deeper transformation and healing of our world. These questions also help us to determine the impact of our actions & interactions.

By building bridges and keeping our focus on what truly matters, we facilitate win-win solutions and foster social innovation.

For more information see also my TEDx talk that explains the Vectors of Love™ concept. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9AJQ6mTnKgY

profile_positions.description: EARTHwise DAO is a gaming start-up for developing and deploying the EARTHwise Game through blockchain technologies, DAO-powered game worlds, and in-game economies with GameFi and DeFi features, and unique AI integrations for beneficial AGI. For more information about the game, visit https://www.earthwisecentre.org/game-campaign
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
EARTHwise Centre was founded to catalyze and empower the vision, wisdom competencies, and skills with which we can co-create a Thrivable world and future. We inspire organisations and people to raise their standards and learn how to act from a place of love and wisdom. Our unique online and in-person training courses, retreats, webinars, education, and coaching services have empowered and inspired thousands of people from around the world. We trained hundreds of business leaders and their teams in leadership wisdom, systemic innovation, value creation, corporate sustainability, whole-system transformation, and business thrivability. Through our Thrivability Education programs we have trained over 300 teachers and supported over 20,000 students since 2012.

For more information visit - http://earthwisecentre.org/

profile_positions.title: External PhD researcher

profile_positions.description:
ELIA is a company based in Mauritius and operating in the Indian Ocean Region, Eastern and Southern Africa, and Arab States.

We carry out consultancy, training, research and project development for ecological literacy, sustainable development, and corporate sustainability.
